website_summaries.verdict: These attractive lamps provide a pleasant glow over your headboard.
pros: Lamp heads are adjustable so you can get the light right where you need it for reading at night
More attractive than some others available
cons: The lights are not terribly bright
The company advertises the bulbs can last 5 years, but some users found them burning out much quicker

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These were very easy to install and look very nice over a bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Isle Sue

customer_reviews.title: NO.  Just plain NO.
customer_reviews.text: it is tiny. And the chain to turn on and off....about 1 inch long. Very inconvenient. to have lamp in correct position you have to reach under shade to get to chain. Angle of picture is very deceptive. And first bulb broke ... the screw in part broke off in lamp. I don't have box etc to return otherwise this would not be on my wall. I am looking in stores to get what I want as evidently pictures are not going to tell the truth.
customer_reviews.author: Kansas reader

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: A very cheap product. One week and the arm has already broken, ONE WEEK and hardly used. Also, when this item was advertised, the heading was written as "Sconces" and the picture reveals TWO and it was written , plurally : SCONCES. I was SO dissappointed when they....I mean...IT arrived. These are junk. They look nice in the picture but these are not of any quality and for the price? Look elsewhere. ALSO: these are tiny candleabra bulbs, yes, the tiny ones, again, VERY misleading. When searching for future products, I will make sure I do not choose anything from this company; just an overall bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: jbar2000

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp But Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp. No instructions but putting inside brace/hanger easy...well it would have been if screws were included but no screws. Came with two bulbs. Would have been good to have a spare but the base of one bulb is broken, with wiring coming out (see photo). If the lamp came with screws and 2 working bulbs it would be a decent value. We need the lamp so made it work.
customer_reviews.author: A.R. Dowling

customer_reviews.title: Quality and nice looking but the price could come down
customer_reviews.text: Compliments my living room. Gives good shade of light but the price could come down a bit. I'll still give 5stars. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: bismark

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Wall lamp for my Closet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp to put in my closet, rather than a battery operated light. So far I am very happy with it. It was the perfect choice for me. Although I don't have an electric outlet in the closet, I attached an extension cord and plugged it in the outlet right outside my closet. It gives off plenty of light so I can see my clothes from one end of the closet to the other. I love the warm glow of the light bulb and the shade. I also like the fact that it has a pull down off and on switch. It was very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Reading Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great lights for a good price. Work perfect hung over our bed for reading. We got the black shades and I really like the character of the lighting. Using the bulbs shipped gives a cool, calming light to relax at night before you go to sleep. The light is plenty bright enough to read but not so much that it disturbs my girlfriend if she goes to sleep before I do. Highly recommend if you're looking for an over the bed light.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Like magic!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in heaven with this little light. Hard wired may look better than a wall light with a cord, but you can't put a price on being able to do it yourself. I got a bulb that is soft warm light instead of the one that it came with. I tied black satin ribbon around the top of the cord and let it hang down over the cord. Really cute... I couldn't be happier. I easily have just the right amount of light anytime I need it right from my chair with just the pull of a chain!
customer_reviews.author: Colene M.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and nice look, however the lights only swing up & down and not to the left or right.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and nice look. The lights swing up and down, however they don't swing to the left or right. This would have been a big help if they could swing in any direction. So only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Northeast Consumer

customer_reviews.title: The look great but don't light up much.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly and installation were easy enough. Great look, though I wished they would have come in a dark brown color instead of black. Does not really light up a space so best for bed side reading or accenting a room.
customer_reviews.author: Applesauce

customer_reviews.title: I really like it and I hope it lasts since it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it and I hope it lasts since it is so cheap. The light bulbs are 3 watt ?? and one broke twisting it out, the screw in top came away from the bulb when I was trying to replace it for a higher watt. Where do you get that kind of bulb?
customer_reviews.author: Kte

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this just for the lightbulbs that come with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 90 year old mother-in-law. She loved the lamp which she uses as a nightlight. However, one of the lightbulbs was broken on arrival and the other light bulb burned out after only 6 weeks. So now she has to go find replacement bulbs, which is confusing for her as family does not live near her. A plus is that you just hang this light on the wall over an outlet and nothing has to be wired.
customer_reviews.author: J. Evanko

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Item defective, had it for only 6 months, and the light started turning off and on by itself while i had it on, i thought it was the bulb so i changed that, but it kept happening, and then a few days later it wouldn't turn on at all. Maybe this lamp works well for others and i just got a bad one, but nevertheless i personaly can't recommend it as a good quality lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie E. George

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these lamps for a home theater... one on each side of the room. They worked perfectly. I didn't care for the 'bright white' bulbs that came with them, so I bought a couple of 'soft white' bulbs and I was happy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Only a 6 foot cord length
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this lamp because the website says "Product Dimensions: 15” Shade Diameter: 6” Cord Length: 8’ 2”" However, it doesn't have a longer cord, the cord is only 6 feet long. I needed a longer cord, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: LNC_TX

customer_reviews.title: Nice & easy
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is nice and not too hard to install. The only problem was one of the bulbs provided was broken at the base. I'm glad they provided 2 bulbs. I do not believe it was broken during shipping, but more of a manufacturing flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline D. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I bought one and it worked so good, I bought another
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and it worked so good ,I bought another. The shipping was rapid, and both lamps function. I am well pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: peacoc_b

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp however as other reviewers have noted the shade came with a large crack. The supplier did not reply to our email complaint. Amazon made a refund very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Papa B

customer_reviews.title: Love the lamp unfortunately only came with 1 bulb instead ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the lamp unfortunately only came with 1 bulb instead of two as stated in the picture. Over all i'm happy since bulbs aren't too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Biker chic
customer_reviews.text: My mother loves it. We did have to put a brighter bulb in it (LED) as her eye sight is bad. We lengthened the pull chain so she doesn't have to reach too far to shut the light off. She uses it as a reading light at night. We placed it above her bed. Works great for her and looks pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: Biker Chick

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I was looking for. Just the right size. Easy to hang. We did use anchors with the screws since they have pull chains and didn’t want to take a chance pulling out if the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Wall Lamp Scones
customer_reviews.text: I really love these Wall Lamp Scones. I had bought one for our bedroom, and then we needed a couple more for the den. We liked the first one we bought so much that we bought two more. They look nice in the picture but they look even nicer when put on the wall! :-)
customer_reviews.author: gramsdaley

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and is just the right size. Gives good light for reading in bed!
customer_reviews.author: RuthE

customer_reviews.title: comfy ambiance
customer_reviews.text: we totally are satisfied with these lamps (we bought 2) easy to install and they made our bedroom so comfy, i want to stay in there more! the delivery was fast and the quality is superb! yes, we will buy another item from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good investment for 40 bucks
customer_reviews.text: These were sold out in the black finish but I ordered the brass and painted them black. They look and work perfectly. Good investment for 40 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: J. Santos

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lamp, worked very good for my project. Wish the light was a bit more soft.
customer_reviews.author: markus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install on wall
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, nice light. Used a small 10 watt bulb instead of what was supplied.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but this mounted sturdy on my wall. Love the look and the pull on/off switch is easy to use for my child. Very happy with this purchase. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Brown

customer_reviews.title: I Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this lamp! It's just right for the side of my bed. It's 40 watts and i don't need more then that. And it's adorable!
customer_reviews.author: TeeTee50

customer_reviews.title: Small lamp but useful
customer_reviews.text: This is nice but I expected it to be bigger. I should have looked closer at product. Only needed it to read by in b d for short periods and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ozetta Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Like how it hangs on the wall. Using it in the hall way
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: commonly
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is so so Not very good because when I'm ready to pull the light, it will shake up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Suting Lin

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: It gives out great light (once I changed the bulb watt size). It comes with a 25Watt....not bright enough to read by. But easy to put up and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty lamp, free bulbs are terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Love the lamps but the free bulbs that came with them only works for a few hours then it turns into a strob light. I bought two lamps and two bulbs have done this already.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn R

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Is actually silver colored instead of gold, but VERY EASY INSTALL. PERFECT brightness of bulbs (which are included) Works perfectly as a bedside lamp and fully adjustable. Would recommend. ONLY INCLUDES ONE.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrea Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: The shade was a little hard to understand how it goes on at first
customer_reviews.author: Denise Stiers

customer_reviews.title: over the bed reading light.
customer_reviews.text: These worked out fine - would have been better with larger bulb for reading, but my laptop/Kindle app provides enough light.
customer_reviews.author: Gamakate

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted next to the couch's chaise section. Quality, installation and delivery - excellent! I may order another one for the Cape house
customer_reviews.author: P Rowe

customer_reviews.title: It looks like you are buying two
customer_reviews.text: It looks like you are buying two. I only received one. It works, just looks stupid on the wall alone.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Lamps look good and a great price
customer_reviews.text: Lamps look good and a great price. Would have given them 5 stars, but the "free lightbulbs" are junk. Two completely fell apart when trying to screw them into the socket. Ended up throwing them away.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Gamache

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Attractive lamps, exactly as expected from the posted photos and description. They're sturdy, easy to install, easy to adjust. Just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Randy B.

customer_reviews.title: contemporary wall lamp sconce
customer_reviews.text: Removed my bedside lamp and hung this lamp on the wall above the the bed now I have more room for other things on nightstand.Easy to put up and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: gram of 3 boys

customer_reviews.title: They should have a place to order the bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I do like it but the 2nd light does not work. No one to call though. My choices are only one return it and not sure where to buy these small light bulbs. Will add a longer chain also
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Fritton Corona

customer_reviews.title: but lamp shades were terrible quality, the fabric covering was all lumpy and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but lamp shades were terrible quality, the fabric covering was all lumpy and crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They arrived on time and installed very easily. I am using them as reading lights in ...
customer_reviews.text: They arrived on time and installed very easily. I am using them as reading lights in bed and they work very well plus they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Thewildsmithberrys

customer_reviews.title: nice lamp.
customer_reviews.text: nice lamp.. I thought there was 2 when I ordered. My confusion. Great deal if there were 2 for the price but still a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Bachman

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to get light where needed.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution to light a dark spot at the jewelry box.
customer_reviews.author: Joan A Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Love this light
customer_reviews.text: Love this light, it puts out the right amount of light over my desk to help me be productive without having to have every light on in the house to see.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: great value and perfect if you are looking for an ...
customer_reviews.text: great value and perfect if you are looking for an alternative to hardwiring a light to a bookcase-like i'm going to do
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps!
customer_reviews.text: Great Wall lamps! I bought 2, adds some nice decor to my bedroom. They are a little annoying to install but other than that I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Soledispa

customer_reviews.title: Surely a great addition to my bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Great angle. Nice addition to my bedroom. I bought two, one for each side.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: nice but not 2 lamps
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking lamp but disappointed that it was only one lamp. Picture misleading thinking I was purchasing 2 lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp, with a few modifications
customer_reviews.text: Good lamps for the price, but I made a few modifications. Not sure why the black lamp didn’t come with black hardware, so I painted the screws and pull string cover with nail polish. The provided led light bulbs are very white, so installed my own 40W warm light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: keri

customer_reviews.title: nice little light to free up the nite stand
customer_reviews.text: everything i expected. nice little light to free up the nite stand. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: Lamp was just what I was looking for. It is exactly as pictured and described. A lovely lamp
customer_reviews.author: Philip Halstead

customer_reviews.title: NICE WALL LAMP
customer_reviews.text: Like it alot. Use it next to my bed for reading, and it works out great.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These look great and are very easy to put up. I love that they come with 2 bulbs each.
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap price and construction. Returned and bought the one at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Allen

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying my new light.
customer_reviews.text: It's just what I was needing. Easy to install and just enough light for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Visually appealing, not mechanically sound
customer_reviews.text: Pull chain broke after 10 months of minimal use. Bulbs that came with light burned out shortly after installation.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the aesthetics fool you
customer_reviews.text: Within one year 2 different wall lamps completely stopped working. I also sent the seller an email and have yet to get a response. My advice, don't buy this. Instead,pay a little extra to get a better lamp.
customer_reviews.author: nurby

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: shade does not stay on lamp i will try to epoxy it on
customer_reviews.author: mary ann robinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pair with Phillips hue
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bedside lamps, paired with Phillips hue they are superb!
customer_reviews.author: travis

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased yet but know they are going to be useful in the areas over our bed
customer_reviews.text: We have not installed the two we purchased yet but know they are going to be useful in the areas over our bed.
customer_reviews.author: beachbird

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp - and bulbs are a bonus!
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp, gives just the amount of light that we were lacking.
customer_reviews.author: WendyR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, works great, and bright. Using it in a hallway
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are nice looking lamps, but just wish they were a bit brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise they are adorable and would have liked to put them up
customer_reviews.text: Lamp came with chipped paint. Otherwise they are adorable and would have liked to put them up, but the chipped paint was too noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2 weeks then started to flicker. New bulb same problem. Faulty wiring.....not good.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: The fixture is easy to install and looks great on the wall
customer_reviews.text: The fixture is easy to install and looks great on the wall. The bulbs that come with the fixture are 25-watt. We replaced them with 40-watt bulbs. Overall, a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and goid value
customer_reviews.text: Really cute light. Works perfect for a lite over the bed. I bought 2. Not sure where I will use the other light yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for above the sofa so I can read

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lamps works great. We got two for reading lamps over the bed. Good quality.

customer_reviews.title: We like the look of the fixture
customer_reviews.text: We like the look of the fixture, but the shade was really flimsy. We ended up replacing it with another
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D Beckel

customer_reviews.title: The lamp is very nice and provides the perfect low light for reading or ...
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is very nice and provides the perfect low light for reading or as a night light for a child's room the needs a little extra light then a outlet night light. Love the lamp!

customer_reviews.title: This is ONE lamp not two as the picture indicates!
customer_reviews.text: I believed I was ordering two lamps, based on the picture and description, but only received one.

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights.......very easy to install...look great over bed headboard...good reading lights

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far. The first bulb lasted only about a week, so I replaced it with an LED one and I recommend doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Product page is somewhat misleading. It states 2 lights and bulbs in one the questions and 2 bulbs in the description. Understand that this product is one actual lamp even though 2 are pictured. The product does take some installation tools such as a drill as it has to drill into the wall. Although when you do have it installed it will look nice.

customer_reviews.title: Worked out fine. I placed it over a mirror and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked out fine. I placed it over a mirror and it looks GOOD.

customer_reviews.title: Lamp is pretty. The light it emits is low but I ...

customer_reviews.title: Research a little more b4 you purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected, but I'll find a spot for it.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to attach to the doors and they look very ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these lamps that I used with 2 old doors to create floor lamps. The lamps worked perfectly for this project. Very easy to attach to the doors and they look very pretty. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I've waited three weeks for my second wall lamp. I only received one lamp. Lyle
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Glatzmaier

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these (bought two)
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these (bought two). We needed something to allow the children on the bunkbeds to read when the other child was sleeping. These fit the bill well. Attach to the wall, so no worries about them throwing a blanket over the lamp when they forget to turn it off...the head swivels in every way we would want it to, and gives enough light to read by, but doesn't light up the whole room. Works perfectly for what we wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: MTop Contributor: Cooking

product_meta.title: Contemporary Wall Lamp Sconce with Free Bulbs (Black/White)
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteAccentuate Your Living Space with Just the Right Amount of Lighting that Will Not Hurt the Eyes to Help You Function Better… 

Bathroom Light Fixture: The adjustable arm is great for moving the head of the lamp where you need extra lighting, 
you can hang the scones above your vanity to help you see better when putting on make-up and getting ready for work. 

Multi-Purpose: These contemporary wall lamps can be used above your headboard, bathroom vanity, dresser, computer desk, dining credenza and buffet, 
or you can use one on each side of your sofa, so you get just the right amount of lighting to help you read, watch TV, or work from home. 

Amazing Gift Idea: The vintage design will make any room look like a high-end resort, add flair and style to your home, 
but don’t forget to make someone special happy for a housewarming, Christmas or just because. 

The Set of 1 Wall Sconce Lamp with 2 Energy Saver Led Bulbs Will Help You To: Create an interior lighting, utilize your wall space efficiently, get more for your buck, 
add sufficient lighting to your living room, bedroom, dining room, kitchen, bathroom, office, hotel, restaurant and many more. 

Specifications: 
Material: Steel & Polyester 
Color: Black & White 
Product Dimensions: 15” Shade Diameter: 6” Cord Length: 8’ 2” 

What is in the Package: 
1 Wall Scones with 2 LED Light Bulbs and Mounting Hardware 


Don’t Miss the Opportunity to Get this Bundle Offer! Click Add to Cart NOW to Order in the Comfort of Your Home.
feature_bullets: Decorative Light: The candelabra design white shade , black arm wall lamps is perfect for adding a touch of contemporary style to your home, you can utilize your walls efficiently and use these scones in your living room, bedroom, dining room, kitchen, bathroom, nursery room or home office.

Easy to Install: Without requiring any hard assembly or installation, these scone lamps are easy to mount on your wall. Hang it near your sofa, bed or table and easily reach for the pull chain, so turning your lamp on/off is convenient.

Inexpensive: When compared to other brands on the market, these chrome wall lamps are sold for an affordable cost. Don’t miss out on this bundle offer, you won’t be disappointed. These scones are built to last you years to come with 100% customer satisfaction guaranteed.

Convenient: Each wall reading lamp comes with 2 300 LM 3W LED bulb with an E12 socket base, these environmentally friendly bulbs will help you reduce your energy bill by 60%, and it can last up to 5 years. With your purchase today, you will be receiving an extra bulb for each lamp, which makes a total of 2 light bulbs.

Bedside Lamps: Why use up valuable floor in your already small bedroom space? These bedside scones are perfect without requiring the use of nightstands, side or accent tables. You can hang one scone on each side of your bed, so reading before sleep becomes a versatile habit.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars149 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
